name: places/ChIJt53wMh5awokRLDec39hqxZo
formattedAddress: 15 Harrison St #1, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 15 Harrison St #1, New York, NY 10013-2890, USA

originalText.text:
Both of my daughters were patients of Dr. Mark Bronsky. I cannot express enough how impressed I have been with the exceptional care provided by Dr. Bronsky and his team.  I had sought opinions from numerous orthodontists, and I know the choice is beyond confusing, especially when treatment plans vary significantly. Dr. Bronsky was incredibly thorough and patient with me and my kids, answering all of my questions. As the daughter of a periodontist, I had plenty!

Dr. Bronsky took the time to thoroughly assess the individual needs of my children, explaining the treatment plan in detail and addressing any concerns I had. He is honest and genuinely caring and most importantly, he prioritizes functional results as much as cosmetic results which is crucial.

I highly recommend Bronsky Orthodontics!

originalText.text: Bronsky Orthodontics is the premier center for orthodontic care.  I first came to Dr. Bronsky in my early twenties - self-conscious about braces and having to deal with cosmetic dental work.  Dr. Bronsky was empathetic, thoughtful, and provided me with a detailed, unique and personalized plan.  He has a superior network of partners, and was able to align his plan with other doctors to ensure the right steps were taken at the right time, with minimal impact to the timeline and my own personal comfort.  10+ years later, after age takes over and you don't properly wear your retainer (wear your retainer!), I came back to fix some shifting I had experienced.  I would not have trusted anyone else with my care but Dr. Bronsky.  Round 2 was no different, and I got the same, precise, thoughtful care I have received 10 years ago from him and his team.  When you're in the patient's chair, nothing else matters to him but you.  He answers all of your questions, always ensures you are comfortable, and takes the time to explain his methodologies so you know where you're going with your treatment.  You are in amazing hands with this team, and will absolutely leave pleased with your results.

originalText.text:
I'm absolutely thrilled with the orthodontic care I received from Dr. Bronsky’s team, from my first visit to the final result, the experience was amazing.

The team works seamlessly, they're on top of everything, and they genuinely care about their patients. This was my second orthodontic treatment at 30, and it was a vastly different and better experience from my previous treatment as a teenager.

The results are outstanding, and I can't recommend Dr. Bronsky enough!

originalText.text: I just finished 2+ years of treatment with braces, I will miss Dr. Bronsky and his incredible staff.  Happy with the results. I recommend Bronsky Orthodontics without hesitation.

text.text: I just finished 2+ years of treatment with braces, I will miss Dr. Bronsky and his incredible staff.  Happy with the results. I recommend Bronsky Orthodontics without hesitation.

originalText.text: This was so slay balls and my teeth are so incredible now. My teeth were all kind of jagged until I came here. I was like a shark. But now my teeth are so great and straight I could probably bite an atom in half the same way obsidian blades can slice them. Overall 15/10
